name: Jolly's Basics in Fantasy world (A Baldi's Basics Mod)
name_original: Jolly's Basics in Fantasy world (A Baldi's Basics Mod)
description:
Jolly actually belong to

@IvanG 

This is a mod of Baldi’s basics and this not apart of the jolly series in this game you would have to collect all of the notebooks to get out as you can.

JOLLY the bee- Baldi

Tweetie- Playtime

George- The principal of things

Maxie - its a bully

The Animatronic Broom- sweeping time

Antonette- Arts and crafters

1st prize- himself

credits goes to ivanG and cgraves and photo negative Mickey for the characters

Play the original Baldi's Basics here

https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics
